Hybridization

Include one sample of 10 ug of 
Make a mix of (per sample) 24 ul Formamide
3 ul H20
1 3 ul 10X salts
1 ul probe
5 mins
overnight 
Make a mix of: 100 ul Tris pH 7.5
100 ul 0.5 EDTA
600 ul 5M NaCl
200 ul FlNAse A (2 mg/ml)
200 ul FiNAse T1 (100 ug/mlper sample and vortex
for 30 mins
Add mg/ml proteinase 
for 10 mins
Phenol extract
Add 2 vols Ethanol (don't add salt)
precipitate
Spin, wash, dry
Resuspend in 5 ul sample buffer (Formamide, 20 mM EDTA, dye)
95-100 5'
GEL: prerun 30 mins 22 milliamps
run 22 milliamps
10X Salts
40 mM Pipes pH 6.4
400 mM NaCl filter, store at
